review: I should have bought one of these when they first came out.  Absolutely awesome.  Provides excellent picture quality, and it is so simple my 4 year old figured it out in a few minutes.  Now we can watch HBO GO, Netflix, and Prime on our dumb tvs.  Works with my IPhone,  and my Android tablet.  No complaints, I plugged it in, connected to it from my cell phone, and was watching HBO GO in under 10 minutes.  Once the playback starts, it does not need your phone/tablet to even be turned on any longer.  Not sure how that is possible, all I know is that it works.  And they kept it simple, any device connected to your wifi can control it.  I liked it so much I bought a 2nd one so I could watch HBO GO on my Vizio smart TV that doesn't have an HBO GO App.If I had to complain, I would ask for a traditional remote control, but then again I always have my cellphone close by...
author: Stephen M.
